extension.searchTitle: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.; National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017;S. 2814 (IS)

titleInfo.title: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2017 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017

extension.shortTitle: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2017
extension.action: Mr. McCain (by request) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services
